SELECT apply.id as applyid,apply.clinicno,apply.patientname,apply.gender,apply.age, patient.mobile,user.username as doctorname, pre.fee,pre.isdispensing,pre.ispaid,pre.createat as diagnosedate, case isdispensing when 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS contanisMedicine from t_b_apply apply JOIN t_b_prescription pre on apply.id = pre.applyid JOIN t_b_patient_item patient on apply.patientitemid = patient.id JOIN t_p_s_user user on pre.createby = user.id
and pre.fee != 0
and apply.orgcode = #{orgCode}
and (apply.patientname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or patient.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or apply.clinicno like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and pre.ispaid = '0'
and (pre.ispaid = '1' and pre.isdispensing = '0')
and (pre.ispaid = '2' or pre.ispaid = '3')
and (pre.isdispensing = '1' or (pre.ispaid = '1' and pre.isdispensing = '2'))
and pre.createat >= #{diagnoseStartDate}
and pre.createat <= #{diagnoseEndDate}
order by DATE_FORMAT(pre.createat,'%Y-%m-%d') desc ,ispaid ASC,FIELD(isdispensing,0,2,1),apply.clinicno DESC
